package.name: couchbase
package.description: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
package.notes:
This is a minor update to the PHP 2.1 SDK.
Changes: * PCBC-356: Added support for N1QL prepared statements. * PCBC-363: Fix issue related to passing invalid ID arguments. * PCBC-366: Correct issue with legacy transcoder compression. * Various minor changes

release.notes: First developer preview release of 2.0 version of PHP client.

This is a minor update to the existing PHP 2.0 developer preview.
New features in a nutshell: * Cluster constructor now accepts a Couchbase Connection String. * Support for cross-SDK compatible data-type flags. * Client-side support for SSL connections.

This is a minor update to the existing PHP 2.0 developer preview 2.
Changes: * Added uncommited by stable management APIs. * Made minor changes to various methods to allow easier use.

This is a minor update to the existing PHP 2.0 beta.
Changes: * Added support for cross-sdk data storage/retrieval. * Added method to debug generated view queries. * Fixed numerous minor bugs since beta.

This is the first GA release of the new 2.0 PHP SDK.
No changes since release 2.0.0beta2.

This is a patch update to the PHP 2.0 SDK.
Changes: * PCBC-303: Allow JSON decoding as associative array. * Added missing append/prepend forwarders. * Fixed various issues with query creation and execution. * Corrected various build issues.

This is a patch update to the PHP 2.0 SDK.
Changes: * PCBC-310: Corrected segfault occuring in some cases when running under Apache and IIS. * Updated PHP script executer to provide accurate error information in Exception stack traces. * Refactored code base for better maintainability.

This is a patch update to the PHP 2.0 SDK.
Changes: * PCBC-318: Fix append/prepend operations failing on new libcouchbase. * PCBC-319: Correct segfault when using persist_to/replicate_to. * Corrected typo in N1QL query interface.

This is a patch update to the PHP 2.0 SDK.
Changes: * PCBC-321: Corrected issue when passing incorrect option parameter type. * Corrected issue related to setting timeouts. * PCBC-317: Updated N1QL querying to support DP4. * Fixed issue with design document management methods.

This is a patch update to the PHP 2.0 SDK.
Changes: * Orphan: Corrected issue where durability checking may not propagate errors. * PCBC-327: group_level semantics now support server 3.x. * Orphan: Corrected issue with some ViewQuery methods. * PCBC-326: Zero-length strings no longer decode as NULL.

This is a patch update to the PHP 2.0 SDK.
Changes: * PCBC-331: CouchbaseBucketManager now has a flush operation to clear a bucket. * Orphan: Minor fix to view management return values. * Orphan: ViewQuery::group_level now can be chained as expected. * PCBC-334: PHP 5.4 transcoder compatibility issues have been fixed. * PHP 5.3 support has been deprecated and PHP 5.6 is now fully supported. * Corrected various memory leaks and segfaults.

This is a patch update to the PHP 2.0 SDK.
Changes: * PCBC-339: Add support for using N1QL with CB Server 4.0.0. * PCBC-343: Added missing touch method to CouchbaseBucket.

This is a minor update to the PHP SDK.
Changes: * PCBC-356: Added support for N1QL prepared statements. * PCBC-363: Fix issue related to passing invalid ID arguments. * PCBC-366: Correct issue with legacy transcoder compression. * Various minor changes
